授業方法:
This course will be held face to face, but may include some ONLINE content in both simultaneous two-way or on-demand format.

Lessons will be designed to foster student autonomy and enhance students' ability to critically assess written materials and oral presentations/lectures in and English-only environment.

Students are expected to actively engage in class discussions based on teacher lectures or previously assigned writing assignments or homework.

Additionally, students can expect to regularly discuss and review course content in pairs or small groups as well as providing individual oral presentations utilized in class
